20101207161427.250|20101207161428.500|CCO|>> SO, LIKE, DON'T TAKE IT OUT

20101207161434.333|20101207161436.000|CCO|BROILER.
20101207161436.000|20101207161437.667|CCO|>> OKAY. 
20101207161437.667|20101207161439.333|CCO|>> SOME OF THE TIPS WHEN USING 
20101207161439.333|20101207161441.000|CCO|GLASSWARE, GLASS COOKWARE. 
20101207161441.000|20101207161442.250|CCO|>> WHAT ARE SOME OF THE DOs, 
20101207161442.250|20101207161443.500|CCO|THEN?

20101207161444.750|20101207161446.000|CCO|IT OUT OF THE OVEN, MAYBE 
20101207161446.000|20101207161447.250|CCO|EVERYTHING COOL OFF VERY SLOWLY.
20101207161447.250|20101207161448.500|CCO|>> SLOWLY, RIGHT. 
20101207161448.500|20101207161449.750|CCO|>> FIRST OF ALL, WHEN USING THE 
20101207161449.750|20101207161451.000|CCO|OVEN WITH THESE THINGS, PRE-HEAT
20101207161451.000|20101207161452.429|CCO|THE OVEN. 
20101207161452.429|20101207161453.857|CCO|>> OKAY. 
20101207161453.857|20101207161455.286|CCO|>> THAT'S A BIGGY.
20101207161455.286|20101207161456.714|CCO|YOU HAVE TO PRE-HEAT YOUR OVEN.
20101207161456.714|20101207161458.143|CCO|ONCE YOU DO TAKE IT OUT OF THE 
20101207161458.143|20101207161459.571|CCO|OVEN, LET IT COOL OFF ON 
20101207161459.571|20101207161501.000|CCO|SOMETHING LIKE A COOLING RACK, A
20101207161501.000|20101207161502.667|CCO|DISH TOWEL OR A DRY POT HOLDER.
20101207161502.667|20101207161504.333|CCO|OKAY?

20101207161506.000|20101207161507.667|CCO|OFF BEFORE YOU WASH IT, PUT IT
